Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.

It's a little messy right now given the road works around the area. That said, they do what they can to making things work. It's still an important bus stop, given it's right by Novena Church, and opposite Novena Square shopping mall. Also right outside Novena Regency, a residence above all the restaurants.
Remember! Need to cross the zebra crossing toward this stop from the church(opposite side)!
Quite a number of buses available
